CustomField.formula: CASE( LEFT( UPPER( Initial_Market_Source__c ), 3), "EML","Email", "WEB","Organic Website", "BAN","Banner Ads", "GAD","Google Ads", "OTH","Other", "OFL", "Offline", "DON", "Donation", "P2P", "P2P Fundraiser", "ADV", "Advocacy", "SUR", "Survey", "PRU", "Purchase", "TAF", "Tell A Friend", "n/a")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Initial Market Source Type. Calculated based on the 3 letter prefix of the "Initial Market Source" field. Part of the SpringBoard package.
CustomField.label: Initial Market Source Type
